de.javasoft.swing.filter
Class ColumnFilter.TextFieldSupport

java.lang.Object
  de.javasoft.swing.filter.ColumnFilter.TextFieldSupport
Enclosing class:
ColumnFilter<M>
protected class ColumnFilter.TextFieldSupport
extends java.lang.Object

Convenience class which encapsulates the wiring of one or more JYTextField with this ColumnFilter. Subclasses of ColumnFilter can use as-is or subclass for more specific needs.

Constructor Summary

          Instantiates a TextFieldSupport with the given matchOnDocumentChange.

Constructor Detail

ColumnFilter.TextFieldSupport

public ColumnFilter.TextFieldSupport()

ColumnFilter.TextFieldSupport

public ColumnFilter.TextFieldSupport(boolean matchOnDocumentChange)
Instantiates a TextFieldSupport with the given matchOnDocumentChange.

Parameters:
matchOnDocumentChange - a boolean indicating whether a document change should directly trigger a matchValueChanged or commit the field's text.
Method Detail

addTextField

public void addTextField(JYTextField field)
Adds the field to this support and wires all necessary listeners.

Parameters:
field - the field to add, must not be null.

removeTextField

public void removeTextField(JYTextField field)
Removes the field from this support and unwires all listeners.

Parameters:
field - the field to remove, must not be null.

maybeCommitEdit

protected void maybeCommitEdit(javax.swing.text.Document document)
Callback method for document listener.

This implementation triggers a matchValueChanged in the ColumnFilter, if incremental. Does nothing otherwise.

Parameters:
document - the document which fired an event.
See Also:
ColumnFilter.matchValueChanged()

getTextFieldPropertyChangeListener

protected final java.beans.PropertyChangeListener getTextFieldPropertyChangeListener()
Returns the PropertyChangeListener to register with each text field. The listener is lazily created on access.

Returns:
the propertyChangeListener to register with each text field, guranteed to not null.
See Also:
createTextFieldPropertyChangeListener()

createTextFieldPropertyChangeListener

protected java.beans.PropertyChangeListener createTextFieldPropertyChangeListener()
Creates and returns the PropertyChangeListener to register with each text field.

This implementation calls matchValueChanged on changes of the value property.

Returns:
the propertyChangeListener to register with each text field, guranteed to not null.
See Also:
ColumnFilter.matchValueChanged()

getDocumentListener

protected final javax.swing.event.DocumentListener getDocumentListener()
Returns the DocumentListener to register with each text field. The listener is lazily created if necessary.

Returns:
the DocumentListener to register with each text field, guaranteed to be not null.
See Also:
createDocumentListener()

createDocumentListener

protected javax.swing.event.DocumentListener createDocumentListener()
Creates and returns the DocumentListener to register with each text field.

This implementation calls maybeCommitEdit on remove-/insertUpdate.

Returns:
the DocumentListener to register with each text field, guaranteed to be not null.
See Also:
maybeCommitEdit(Document)

getFocusListener

protected final java.awt.event.FocusListener getFocusListener()
Returns the FocusListener to register with each text field. Lazily creates the listener if needed.

Returns:
the FocusListener to register with each text field, guaranteed to be not null.
See Also:
createFocusListener()

createFocusListener

protected java.awt.event.FocusListener createFocusListener()
Creates and returns the FocusListener to register with each text field.

This implementation calls matchValueChanged on a not-temporary focusLost.

Returns:
the FocusListener to register with each text field, guaranteed to be not null.
See Also:
ColumnFilter.matchValueChanged()

getTextField

protected JYTextField getTextField(javax.swing.text.Document document)
Returns the first text field in list with the given Document, or null if none found.

Parameters:
document - the document we are listening to
Returns:
the text field with the given Document or null if not found

getTextFields

protected java.util.List<JYTextField> getTextFields()
Returns the list of text fields, guaranteed to be not null.

Returns:
the list of text fields, may be empty but not null.

createSearchAction

public javax.swing.Action createSearchAction()
Creates a search action as appropriate for a JYSearchField with a search popup installed by this helper class. Ignores events from the popup, calls matchValueChanged otherwise.

Returns:
the search action for the JYSearchField.

installMatchRulePopup

public void installMatchRulePopup(JYSearchField field)
Creates and installs a SearchPopup in the given JYSearchField. MenuItems represent selection-enabled AbstractActionExt. On selection, the filter's matchRuleChanged is messaged with the newly selected action as parameter. Silently does nothing if the RowFilterModel doesn't support multiple match rules.

Parameters:
field - the searchField to install the popup on.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the field is not controlled by this support.

getPopupMenuListener

protected javax.swing.event.PopupMenuListener getPopupMenuListener()
Returns the PopupMenuListener to install on the search popup, guaranteed to be not null. The listener is lazily creates if not yet available.

Returns:
the PopupMenuListener to install on the search popup.

createPopupMenuListener

protected javax.swing.event.PopupMenuListener createPopupMenuListener()
Creates the PopupMenuListener to install on the search popup. This implementation triggers a maybeCommit on a willBecomeInvisible which is not preceded by a menuCancelled.

Returns:
the PopupMenuListener to install on the search popup.

maybeCommitEdit

protected void maybeCommitEdit(javax.swing.JPopupMenu source)
Commits any the text in the search field if the input mode is not incremental.

Parameters:
source - the JPopupMenu which triggered the commit.

uninstallMatchRulePopup

public void uninstallMatchRulePopup(JYSearchField field)
Removes and uninstalls the items in the popup of the given JYSearchField's.

Parameters:
field - the search field to uninstall the popup.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the field is not controlled by this support.
